channel.title: vim on MartinLwx's blog
channel.description: Recent content in vim on MartinLwx's blog

item.title: Vim Macro 101
item.description: Intro In the process of learning vim, the most enlightening sentence for me is : vim is a kind of programming language I once try to learn vim a long time ago. However, the key combination logic is very difficult to remember in my opinion. So I later gave up learning vim and switched to a normal text editor. My view of vim changed when I met this course: Missing semester.
